mapper.sql: CPN_OID, CPN_TYPE, AMOUNT, CPN_TIME, CONFIRMED, CREATE_TIME, CREATOR_OID
mapper.update:
UPDATE CONSUMPTION
CPN_TYPE = #{cpnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CPN_TIME = #{cpnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CONFIRMED = #{confirmed,jdbcType=BIT},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_OID = #{creatorOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WHERE CPN_OID = #{cpnOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

UPDATE CONSUMPTION SET CPN_TYPE = #{cpnType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AMOUNT = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CPN_TIME = #{cpnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CONFIRMED = #{confirmed,jdbcType=BIT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_OID = #{creatorOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL} WHERE CPN_OID = #{cpnOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
